lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Sparks signed the three-time W.N.B.A. All-Star guard Marie Ferdinand-Harris. In six seasons, she averaged 11.5 points, 3.2 rebounds and 2.1 assists.
snippet: The Los Angeles Sparks signed the three-time W.N.B.A. All-Star guard Marie Ferdinand-Harris. In six seasons, she averaged 11.5 points, 3.2 rebounds and 2.1 assists.
